# this is the build file for project 鼎爐
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.28.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
set(CMAKE_C_COMPILER "/opt/llvm-19/bin/clang")
set(CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER "/opt/llvm-19/bin/clang++")
project(鼎爐 VERSION 1.0.0 LANGUAGES CXX)
set(CMAKE_CXX_SCAN_FOR_MODULES ON)

# target
add_executable(hello_world "")
set_target_properties(hello_world PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "hello_world")
set_target_properties(hello_world PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/linux/x86_64/release")
target_include_directories(hello_world PRIVATE
    build/.gens/hello_world/linux/x86_64/release/platform/windows/idl
)
target_include_directories(hello_world INTERFACE
    build/.gens/hello_world/linux/x86_64/release/platform/windows/idl
)
target_compile_options(hello_world PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-m64>
)
set_target_properties(hello_world PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(hello_world PRIVATE cxx_std_23)
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET hello_world PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "c++_shared")
endif()
target_link_options(hello_world PRIVATE
    -m64
)
target_sources(hello_world PRIVATE
    main.cpp
    hello.mpp
)
